name: Maui Listana
text: for some of the people who comment,parang wala na pag asa e. They believe what they want to believe. If you try to provide facts and credible sources, they will ignore it and say you're paid.Someone messaged me asking how much i was paid to be a troll and if I could refer her.  😒
